# Nested message conformance tests
# Format: test_name message_type

# Simple nesting
nested_empty Outer
nested_simple Outer
nested_with_repeated Outer

# Deep nesting
deep_level0_only Level0
deep_all_levels Level0

# Node tree
node_leaf Node
node_with_children Node
node_deep_tree Node

# Optional nested
optional_absent OptionalNested
optional_present OptionalNested
optional_empty_payload OptionalNested
